ygData.subject: Back on track...
ygData.msgSnippet: Praise Bertox that someone is finally talking about tinkering again:) I love my king and all but the conversation can only go so far. Well as for Oot i will
ygData.messageBody:
Praise Bertox that someone is finally talking about tinkering again:)
I love my king and all but the conversation can only go so far. Well
as for Oot i will explore that zone as much as i can although i am still
4 bloody skill pts away from my first attempt at an aqualung. Best of
luck to all and might i recommend that useing locate undead because if there
is a boat then there will probably be undead there:) Unfortunatly i don't
think it is a small tattered cloak we are looking for. In all the other books
components of the items are in caps and are always the same name for the item
as in the books. So I think we are looking for a tattered gnomish cloak and
recommend killing any so called... BAD gnomes out in Norrath in the hopes that
they may have the item. BTW tinkering is the best skill in the game in the fact
that there is so much still to do with it that hasn't been discovered.
It may be expensive as all hell but who cares it is fun:)

Grundup Puddlejumper Tinkerholic skill or 99 Tallon Zek
